December 22, 1885. Received a large bundle of letters from Brother Daniel [Bourdeau]. He writes tenderly. May the Lord guide His servant in judgment is my prayer and spare his life until his work is done. He does too much, and we know not how to hinder him. He has an active brain that cannot 


                                    -271- 

find repose and rest.--Ms 30, 1885, p. 4. (Diary, "Labors in Switzerland--#3," December 16 to 31, 1885.)
